reviews.review:
Dead by Daylight is an excellent co-operative experience to play with friends. This review will focus on the survivor aspect as my current 176 hours has been a majority survivor hours (not that I dislike playing as killers but playing as a survivor is better with friends). 

The game consist of 4 survivors (real players) who have varying perks needing to start multiple generators in order to power exit gates to escape from a real person playing as a killer who's job is to essentially do just that, kill the survivors by knocking them down and putting them on sacrificial hooks using a variety of unique perks which bring exciting differences to every match to overcome as a survivor or master as a killer. 

Some points that are missing in co-operative games like this is that there is no proximity or voice chat at all for that matter, it makes it hard to co-operate with others, but again in reality you wouldn't be talking much if you were stalked by a ruthless killer, besides most players I found have excellent non-verbal communication and most players are genuinely helpful and promote teamwork although the odd time you'll find a cheap killer or one who just lets you go which ruins the fun of the game. 

When I first played this game there was less than 10 killers and 10 survivors and now those numbers have at least doubled, adding countless new killers and survivors from pop-culture or their own universes which have consistently drawn me to jump back in the game and learn how to escape using new survivor perks and overcoming a challenging new killer in a brand new locale. Adding this game is consistently updated!

Regardless you should get this game with a friend (or two, or three) and enjoy it whether you want to co-operate with or kill your friends i'm sure you'll have fun regardless. I highly recommend on all accounts.

Very steep learning curve when matching with others players. Get used to losing A LOT as a survivor, as the game relies on team play but doesn't have any form of communication. It's therefore more fun and enjoyable only when playing with a full group (5) of people, on voice comms, not random strangers.
Can't wait to waste 1000 hours in this game instead of being productive, finding gf and high paying job
i hate this game.....but you should definitely try it out no doubt.

i played this game ever since it came out and it never disappointed me i really recommend playing dead by daylight

The game is great but it has some MASSIVE problems. 1. Mach making is BULLSHIT (sorry) i hardly ever get people at the same rank as me when im playing killer. i was once rank 17 (killer) and got a rank 6 as my enemy. not only that but Mach making doesnt look at what rank a person was before geting the rank reset nor does it look at the playtime or perks of an indevidual when creating a mach. 80% of Survivors i face against have perks like desisiv strike, unbreakebly, spin chill, self care, and so on. These are all perks from diferent survivors meaning the players (survivors) have played/levelt multiple survivors (which takes a LOT of time and good Trials aka skill) yet i am just a rank 16 newbi who just got the game yesterday! the problem is that mach making ignors a LOT of things (already listed some) and just looks at the rank (which as i also already said hardly works as you never get people in your or close to your rank) and thanks to that maches can go from fun and fair to "wow those survivors were garbage" to "WOW those survivors beat the shit out of me" and rolling a dice IS NOT FUN. then theres also problems like some maps having masive flavs (in the resident evil map the lighting was so bad a survivor could have hidden in those shadovs, no problem) and some maps being SPAMMT with palets (in one trial every SINGEL survivor just campet and waisted palets yet they were fine because of the MASSIVE amount of palets) and i didnt even talk about how windows effekt that (even if a map isnt as spammt with palets there are still multiple windows that make the game a chore insted of fun. then there also some perks komps such as desisive strike and unbreakebyl which forses you to not attack the survivor. the thing is that at that point i (the KILLER) fell like i am at the mercy of others. pls just fix machmaking and some maps and i would recomend it. but right now... nah
This game sucks, it's my favorite game now
a myers did a 360, he then hooked me, and he moonwalked away. 10/10 would like to see again
